biotools.summary: BIII (BioImage Informatics Index, biii.eu) is a registry of software tools, image databases for benchmarking, and training materials for bioimage analysis. Software tools are organized as either a full protocol of analysis (workflow), a specific component to construct a workflow, or a software platform or library (collection). They are described using EDAM-bioimaging. All entries are exposed following FAIR principles and accessible for other usage with ODC-By v1.0 license.
